title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Junkers JU-52 Retrofit - Navigating
description:
In this how to we are going to look how you can use the different navigation systems in the Junkers JU-52 Retrofit. We will depart from Klagenfurt Airport  (LOWK) and set course to Lubljana which is located in Slovenia. During our short trip we do use both NDB and VOR navigation beacons.
